attr.title: Spotify Connect
attr.desc: Spotify Connect uses Librespot which allows you to stream music to your handheld via Spotify Premium. It even works in the background, allowing you to play music, no matter what your doing on your handheld!
attr.inst:
This port is ready to run:
- Install "Spotify Connect" port.
- Open the port and toggle it on.
- Select your handheld in Spotify devices on your Desktop or phone.
- Close app if you want to play games. (L1 + R1)
- The app dynamically registers if Spotify is running, so if you want to turn it off,  just open the port again and use the toggle switch.
